translation.en: -[Sam grunts] -You saw the witch and you survived.
Only Cindy Berman would expect to clean the outhouse and not get dirty.
translation.ko: 여기 청소하면서 깔끔 떠는 건 신디 버먼 너밖에 없을걸

translation.en: -Who are you? -Nick Goode. Nice to meet you.
translation.ko: - 정체가 뭐예요? - 닉 구드야, 만나서 반가워

translation.en: Deep down, you feel it, don't you?
[Ziggy] Bad things always happen to Shadysiders.
Mary… she tried to kill him.
[Cindy] We have to find a way out.
We have to bury this thing… right fucking now.
-Where is she? The body? -I don't know.
We know where the body is, so all we need is the hand.
translation.ko: 몸이 있는 곳은 아니까 이제 손만 있으면 돼요

translation.en: Is it still buried under the Hanging Tree?

translation.ko: 한 마리 더 있는데 거꾸로 나오고 있어

translation.en: I feel it. It's fighting to get out.
We're going to lose her. We're going to lose both.
Don't go wobbly on me now, Henry.
[man] Seven piglets. And not a stillborn among them.
Luck and a very sharp knife.
This wicked one is going to Solomon.
-He's lucky to have a friend like you. -Father…
translation.ko: - 그 녀석은 네가 있어 다행이지 - 아버지

translation.en: First his child, then his wife. He needs someone to take care of him.
translation.ko: 자식에 아내까지 잃었으니 돌봐줄 사람이 필요해

translation.en: I'm not marrying Solomon bloody Goode, if that's what you're driving at.
translation.ko: 아무리 그런 소리 하셔도 솔로몬 구드하고 결혼 안 해요

translation.en: I worry about you. Is it so wrong for a father to wish his daughter to wed?
translation.ko: 걱정돼서 그런다, 아비가 돼서 딸자식 결혼은 시켜야지

translation.en: And leave you alone to eat up all the bacon?
A full moon rises before nightfall.
Good night to enjoy the fruits of the land.
A full moon rises before nightfall.
A good night to enjoy the fruits of the land.
Try to clean yourself up before then.
[children singing] ♪ Pastor Miller, blind as a bat ♪
♪ Pastor Miller, blind as a bat! ♪
♪ Tried to read the Bible And his eyes went splat! ♪
Oh, but I see you. I've got eyes in the back of my head!
translation.ko: 하지만 너희는 보여 머리 뒤에 눈이 있거든!

translation.en: -Don't be a brat, Constance! -Don't be a shrew, Abigail!
A full moon rises before nightfall.
Good night to enjoy fruits of the land.
You tell Mother and I'll cut your braids off your head.
translation.ko: 말하면 네 땋은 머리 전부 잘라낼 줄 알아

translation.en: Don't be getting us into trouble. You know what Mother will do.
translation.ko: 일 크게 만들지 마 어머니 성격 알잖아

translation.en: A full moon rises before nightfall.
Holy Hannah Miller? Don't tell me you're going.
translation.ko: 뭐야, 해나 밀러? 설마 너도 가겠다고?

translation.en: In fact, I'm going with Lizzie before to get berries from the widow.
translation.ko: 그 전에 과부한테 열매 받으러 리지랑 같이 갈 거야

translation.en: Hannah, it's one thing for Lizzie to trade with that hag.
translation.ko: 해나, 그 과부와 거래하러 리지가 가는 거랑

translation.en: It's another for the pastor's daughter.
translation.ko: 목사님 딸이 가는 건 다른 문제야

translation.en: Aren't you even a little curious?
I'll only go if you go.
Girl, what's taking so long? I need help with…
translation.ko: 왜 이렇게 오래 걸리니? 아직 할 게…

translation.en: I can see a secret about you, girl.
And a good day to you, Thomas.
Don't you want to hear it,
I see all the dark secrets in Union.
I see the darkness in you, girl!
It's too much. I can't accept it.
[Sarah] Just think of it as my dowry.
We're practically married. Haven't you heard?
Well, in that case, tell your father this isn't nearly worth it.
translation.ko: 그렇다면 얘기가 다르지 이거론 어림도 없어

translation.en: Shadows fall on us all now and then.
My brother wants me to give up.
He says the Goode family are not farmers.
But these lands, they are fertile. I know it.
We'll have a healthy crop yet.
The sun will shine on us.

translation.ko: 세라 피어, 말 한번 곱게 한다

translation.en: Well, I'm going to lose light.
Nothing good comes from those woods after sundown.
translation.ko: 해 진 후에는 그 숲에 안 가는 게 좋아

translation.en: Shouldn't you be sleeping? Father wouldn't approve.
translation.ko: 누나야말로 안 자? 아버지가 화내실 거야

translation.en: [Lizzie] The berries make you see the world beyond our own. Just one bite.
translation.ko: 그 열매를 하나만 먹어도 다른 세상이 눈앞에 펼쳐져

translation.en: [Sarah] What does an old lady need with that? [Lizzie] She's not just an old lady.
translation.ko: - 그 할머닌 그게 왜 필요해? - 평범한 할머니가 아니야

translation.en: She drinks the blood of virgins to keep her youth.
She sacrificed her husband to become the Devil's bride.
translation.ko: 남편을 제물로 바쳐서 악마의 신부가 됐대

translation.en: That's how she gained eternal life.
Well, I heard she kept the company of the natives,
and that she even fell in love with one.
She learned their medicine too. Solomon told me.
translation.ko: 의학 지식도 원주민들에게 배운 거고 솔로몬이 그랬어

translation.en: He took his wife to her after they lost their child,
translation.ko: 자식을 잃은 후에 아내를 과부에게 데려갔는데

translation.en: Are you sure this is the right way? How do you know where we're going?
translation.ko: 지금 가는 길이 맞긴 해? 넌 길을 어떻게 알아?

translation.en: I've been there before. Remember when Abigail had her ring of fire?
translation.ko: 가 본 적이 있거든 애비게일 사건 기억 안 나?

translation.en: She was scratching like a dog during Father's sermon.
translation.ko: 우리 아버지 예배 시간에 계속 몸을 긁었지

translation.en: Mother told me she'd lain with a demon.
Well, whoever she lay with, Abbi made me go to the widow with her.
translation.ko: 누구랑 잤든, 애비게일은 나랑 같이 과부한테 갔어

translation.en: -And the widow fixed her with witchcraft? -Yes, witchcraft.
And some foul-smelling paste made for whores like Abbi Berman.
translation.ko: 애비게일 같은 애들한테 쓰는 냄새 지독한 고약도 주더라

translation.en: The veil has grown thin with the turn of the moon.
Beware the Devil. He lives in that book.
He calls to you from it.
he'll bore himself beneath your skin
and he'll consume you from the inside out.
translation.ko: 네 안에서 점점 널 잠식할 거야

translation.en: -[widow shouting] Get out! You get out! -[crow squawking]
To the fruits of the land.
Sarah Fier, you want a kiss too?
You know, maybe if you weren't such a frigid bitch--
translation.ko: 그러게 평소에 뻣뻣한 년처럼 굴지 말고…

translation.en: And if you're still so eager,
I'm sure there's a mule tied up who will overlook your flaws in the dark.
translation.ko: 묶여 있는 노새라도 찾아봐 너 같은 놈도 받아줄지 모르지

translation.en: I'm just not afraid with you.
translation.ko: 너랑 있으면 무서운 게 없어서 그래

translation.en: Tell me to stop and I shall.
What if it was the widow or Caleb?
Caleb can barely find his own member.
But if he saw us, if he tells--
That spoiled piglet doesn't scare me.
Well, let them hang us then.
I was not alive before now anyway.
translation.ko: 어차피 이전까지는 살아도 사는 게 아니었어

translation.en: You've overslept. I've done most of the morning work.
translation.ko: 늦잠 잤잖아 아침 잔일 내가 거의 다 했어

translation.en: There's something wrong with my father.
[whispering] The voice shall sing. Order's furnace beckons now.
translation.ko: 노래가 들릴 거야 교단의 아궁이가 부른다

translation.en: To be freed, to be released.
listening to things only he can hear.
I look in his eyes and it's as if…
As if something crawled in from the night and put on Father's skin.
translation.ko: 밤새 뭔가가 아버지 속으로 기어들어 간 느낌이야

translation.en: Mother's gone to the meeting house.
She says we must ask God,
but I don't know which Psalm, what passage--
translation.ko: 근데 어느 찬송가나 어느 구절이 필요한지…

translation.en: She can't know you were here.
translation.ko: 너 여기 온 거 아시면 안 돼

translation.en: I'm not to see you anymore.
You won't stop until you've completely ruined her life, will you?
translation.ko: 얘 인생을 얼마나 더 망쳐야 속이 시원하겠니?

translation.en: Thomas saw you last night in town!
He's telling everyone! How dare you bring this filth into our home!
translation.ko: 다 소문내고 있다고! 이런 추잡한 걸 집에 들이다니

translation.en: I see what you really are, girl.
God knows what you are, girl!
You'd better pray for mercy on your damned soul!
translation.ko: 네 사악한 영혼에는 자비가 필요할 거야

translation.en: [father] Sarah, Thomas has been talking. There something you want to tell me?
translation.ko: 세라, 토머스가 떠들고 다니더구나 나한테 할 얘기 있니?

translation.en: I heard you come home late last night.
You were out with the pastor's daughter, weren't you?
[father] If your mother was still alive…
You know, it was your mother who convinced us to settle this land.
translation.ko: 이곳에 정착하자고 한 건 네 어머니였어

translation.en: She was wise enough to understand this land was special.
translation.ko: 이 땅이 특별하단 사실을 알고 있었지

translation.en: She said she could feel it in the air.
and made up our own Eden here.
And I fear in her absence…
There has always been a strangeness in you, Sarah.
translation.ko: 어릴 때부터 넌 평범하지 않았어, 세라

translation.en: Something perhaps a mother could have rooted out,
translation.ko: 네 어머니를 닮은 것일 수도 있지만

translation.en: but you were raised like a boy.
I gave you too much freedom,
and now it is too late.
[Mad Thomas] The dark one has come
to harvest the bitter fruit of the evil we have sown.
translation.ko: 우리가 심은 악이 맺은 쓴 열매를 거두고

translation.en: [Mad Thomas] And yet you all smile,
blind to the horrors around us.
But you see it now, don't you?
clogs it with our sin. [man 1] It's stuck!
He takes our water. He takes our life blood!
translation.ko: 우리의 생명 줄인 물을 빼앗아 갔어!

translation.en: -What's going on here? -The bucket's caught on something.
translation.ko: - 무슨 일이야? - 양동이에 뭔가 걸렸나 봐

translation.en: A dead dog in the well!
-[man 1] Get it out! -Our water! It's poisoned!
[Thomas] See? You have already drunk from the cup of darkness.
This is the work of the Devil. He has come to stake our land.
translation.ko: 이건 악마의 짓이야 우리 땅을 취하러 왔다고

translation.en: Who among you has welcomed the Devil to Union?
translation.ko: 유니언에 악마를 불러들인 게 대체 누구야?

translation.en: and cast his darkness over us.
I didn't mean to stop by unexpected.
And that's when I saw something in the trees.
I don't know. It was so dark.
I thought it was Caleb or…
and the pastor is sick and…
and I feel half mad, and now I wonder
if perhaps something is wrong with me.
translation.ko: 나한테 뭔가 문제가 있는 것 같아

translation.en: I was never normal. My own father said so.
Maybe I was born wicked and strange.
translation.ko: 내 천성이 사악하고 이상한 걸지도 몰라

translation.en: Maybe it was the Devil in the woods.
Maybe the Devil is in me.
Stop! You sound like Mad Thomas.
Thomas is a mindless drunk, nothing more.
Look around, Solomon. There is blight everywhere.
translation.ko: 주변을 봐, 솔로몬 온갖 재앙이 닥치잖아

translation.en: I… I… I grant you that, but you…
Hannah was just a dalliance, Sarah.
[crying] Because it was not just a dalliance.
one does not summon the Devil by chance.
Even the weakest heart, the most corruptible soul,
You can always come to me, Sarah.
My door is always open to you.
-The Devil has locked himself in there! -[man 1] Pastor! Pastor!
He's locked the children in the Meeting House. A dozen at least.
translation.ko: 아이들과 집회소에 들어가서 문을 잠갔어, 열댓 명은 될걸

translation.en: [Pastor Miller mumbling] Because they are. We call upon which they call within.
translation.ko: 그러하기 때문이다 안에서의 부름에 답할 뿐

translation.en: -Let me go! Let me go! Cyrus! -Constance!
and evil force at work here.
If we are ever to end this misery… Aye!
…then we must root out the guilty.
Our pastor was a man of God.
-[crowd] Right. -[Jakob] And this was not him!
-He was possessed by a darkness. -[crowd] Yes!
My child, my dear Constance, and many others…
…many of our entire bloodlines have been stolen from us.
I saw some little lambs of our town…
laughing, dallying on the full moon last!
translation.ko: 보름달이 떠 있는 동안 시시덕거리는 걸 봤죠

translation.en: There were some of us in the woods, but there was no…
We drank Apple Jack. We danced.
We are young. That is not a crime!
You have sinned! You have sinned!
For they will bear the Devil's mark!
But just as my brother Solomon
heroically expelled the darkness among us
we too will punish and surmount this evil!
As survivors, our faces always will remain toward the sun.
translation.ko: 살아남은 우리들 앞에는 밝은 태양이 비출 겁니다

translation.en: [watchman] I traced it on my patrol!
This scourge centers on Union proper.
I've searched the woods. It does not extend beyond the settlement.
translation.ko: - 맞아 - 숲도 확인했는데 그쪽까진 퍼지지 않았어요

translation.en: We are being punished, and I have a list of names!
translation.ko: 그 벌을 우리가 받고 있죠 짐작 가는 자들이 있소!

translation.en: Oh, then show it to us! Show it to us!
It was some nights back when the full moon had risen just beside the sun.
translation.ko: 며칠 전 해 질 녘 보름달이 막 떴을 때였죠

translation.en: She witched me and led me to the woods.
-[Caleb] The red mule became a horned man. -[laughter]
translation.ko: 붉은색 노새가 뿔 달린 남자로 변했고

translation.en: And she made me watch as she lay with the Devil.
translation.ko: 그 여잔 악마와 자는 모습을 내가 보게 했죠

translation.en: As both of them lay with the Devil.
I saw Hannah Miller and Sarah Fier.
-I saw Sarah Fier. -I saw Sarah Fier.
translation.ko: - 세라 피어를 봤소 - 세라 피어를 봤습니다

translation.en: -We need to get away from here! -And go where?
[Elijah] Here! They're here! Witches over here!
[Caleb] The Devil is in this disgusting whore! [Hannah] No!
translation.ko: - 악마가 깃든 년이야! - 안 돼, 저리 가!

translation.en: [Elijah] As sure as the sun rises, we will purge Union
We will not rest and we will not have mercy!
[Elijah] So help me, God, we will be cleansed of these anathemas!
-[all shouting] Yeah! -We will have our justice!
[Caleb] I did, there's no one there.
Did you hear that? The other side of the house.
Take your musket round back to the Fier house.
translation.ko: 소총 가지고 피어 집으로 다시 가

translation.en: Keep an eye on George Fier.
Keep an eye out for that witch.
[breathing heavily] What have they done to you?
I am to hang on the morrow.
And if you don't flee, you will too.
translation.ko: 도망 안 가면 너도 그렇게 돼
- 널 두곤 못 가 - 가야 해!

translation.en: That is not how it works. You do not summon the Devil by chance.
translation.ko: 그렇지 않아 악마는 우연히 부를 수 없다고

translation.en: You have to make a choice.
It doesn't matter if we did it or not.
They think we're guilty, so we are.
translation.ko: 저 사람들 눈엔 그냥 우리가 죄인이야

translation.en: So what difference does it make if we do now?
translation.ko: 어차피 이렇게 된 거 진짜로 해도 상관없겠지?

translation.en: -What are you saying? -I will go back to the widow.
I will make a deal with the Devil.
But the Devil… Are you mad?
I fear the neighbor who would accuse me.
translation.ko: 내가 무서운 건 날 마녀로 모는 동네 사람과

translation.en: I fear the mother that would let her daughter hang.
translation.ko: 자기 딸이 교수형을 당하게 두는 어머니

translation.en: They lead us like lambs to the slaughter and expect us to just follow.
translation.ko: 도살장에 끌려가는 양처럼 우리가 순순히 따르길 바라지

translation.en: When this is over, we will leave this place.
translation.ko: 다 끝나고 나면 우리 여기서 나가서

translation.en: then kiss in the broad daylight.
I will give them a witch.
-Elijah, I said enough! -Please, you have to help me!
Hannah and I, we didn't do this!
-You're bleeding. -It doesn't matter. Listen to me.
translation.ko: - 피 나잖아 - 상관없어, 내 말 들어

translation.en: I went back to the woods, to the widow.
with a… a kind of instruction, an incantation.
translation.ko: 설명 같은 게 적혀 있었어 주문처럼

translation.en: I think someone struck a deal with the Devil.
translation.ko: 누군가 악마와 계약을 맺은 것 같아

translation.en: There's no one here but me.
Do not try to intimidate me, Caleb. I am not some child!
translation.ko: 멋대로 굴지 마, 케일럽 난 애가 아니야!

translation.en: [Caleb] If only your word was enough, Solomon.
translation.ko: 네 말만 믿을 순 없어, 솔로몬

translation.en: What's in the back room, Solomon?
[distant shouting] Sarah Fier! Come out, Sarah Fier!
What do you have to hide?
I'll tell you once more. There's no one here, but me.
translation.ko: 다시 한번 말한다 여긴 나밖에 없어

translation.en: [man 3] Sarah Fier! Go around the back! She's gotta be here somewhere!
translation.ko: 세라 피어! 뒤쪽 확인해, 어딘가 있어

translation.en: [Solomon] Leave immediately, or I'll make you leave.
Only I've grown tired of watching fortune turn a blind eye to me.
translation.ko: 하지만 운명이 날 외면하는 걸 더는 못 참겠더라

translation.en: How could I what? Take what we all want?
What we all came here for?
what no amount of praying could ever bring.
translation.ko: 아무리 기도해도 못 얻는 것을 손에 넣을 수 있어

translation.en: One person every few years seems a small price to pay.
translation.ko: 몇 년에 한 사람씩이면 나쁜 조건은 아니잖아

translation.en: Yet you resign yourself to it!
They're afraid because they know you're different.
translation.ko: 사람들은 네가 자기들과 달라서 무서운 거야

translation.en: Someone who refuses to settle for the rules of these dogmatists,
translation.ko: 남들이 멋대로 정한 규칙에 따르는 걸 거부하고

translation.en: who seeks more from the world.
-[Solomon] Stop it! Stop, stop, stop! -No, no!
Please, do not make me hurt you! I love you, Sarah! I love you!
translation.ko: 널 다치게 하기 싫어 난 널 사랑해, 세라!

translation.en: Stop fighting! I don't want to hurt--
[man 1] Told you she was a witch!
Confess your sins or burn in eternal hell.
-No! She's lying! -I walked with the Devil!
The truth shall be your curse.
It will follow you for eternity.
I will show them what you've done.
[Lizzie] We can't just leave her here,

translation.ko: 이 나무 아래 혼자는 못 둬

translation.en: [Isaac] Let's move her, bury her somewhere else.
So no one else knows where she is.
The truth shall be your curse.
[Sarah] I will shadow you for eternity.
I will show them what you've done.
I will never let you go.
Uh… Uh, no, sir. I'm good over here.
[whispering] His dad and his grandpa and his great grandpa!
[Nick] She's clearly suffering from some kind of a…
I was back in time. I was Sarah Fier, and Sarah Fier was innocent.
translation.ko: 세라 피어의 과거를 겪고 왔어 그 여자는 죄가 없어

translation.en: She isn't turning people in Shadyside into killers. She wasn't a witch!
translation.ko: 셰이디사이드 사람들을 살인마로 만들지도 않고, 마녀도 아니야

translation.en: [woman over radio] We have a 5150 in possession of car 961.
-Suspects on their way. -Josh! Listen! Solomon Goode--
translation.ko: - 용의자들이 도주 중이다 - 잘 들어! 솔로몬 구드가…

translation.en: made a deal with the Devil, then framed Sarah to cover his own Puritan ass.
translation.ko: 악마와 계약을 한 걸 속이려고 세라 피어에게 누명을 씌웠어

translation.en: The Goodes, they're trading us. People from Shadyside.
translation.ko: 셰이디사이드 사람들을 구드 가문이 팔아넘기는 거야

translation.en: -[Deena] Goode gives a name to the Devil. -Ryan Torres.
-[Deena] The Devil takes over that person. -[whispering voice] Ryan!
Then that person kills and murders.
translation.ko: 그러면 그 사람이 살인마가 되는 거야

translation.en: [Deena] And the Devil feeds on this blood of dead Shadysiders.
translation.ko: 셰이디사이드 사람들이 죽으면 악마가 그 피를 취하는 거지

translation.en: And Goode gets whatever he wants.
translation.ko: 그 대가로 구드는 원하는 걸 얻어

translation.en: All of Sunnyvale gets better and better.
And the Goodes do it over and over, again and again.
translation.ko: 구드 집안은 이런 짓을 계속하고 있어

translation.en: One Goode from every generation passing down the evil.
translation.ko: 세대마다 한 명이 대표로 악마를 후대에게 전하지

translation.en: -Abbadon, Ahriman… -[Deena] Right to Sheriff Nick Goode.
She's the only one who's ever figured out the truth…
And the killers came after us to keep us from uncovering it.
translation.ko: 그걸 알아내지 못하게 하려고 살인마들이 온 거였구나

translation.en: Yes, to protect Goode's deal with the Devil.
translation.ko: 그래, 악마와 구드 집안의 계약을 보호하려고

translation.en: [Josh] If the killers were after us before…
now that we know the truth, now we know about Goode's deal…
translation.ko: 근데 이젠 우리가 구드의 계약까지 다 알아 버렸잖아

translation.en: Look at her! I told you it wouldn't work! There's no ending it.
translation.ko: 쟤 좀 봐, 소용없다고 했지? 끝이 없단 말이야

translation.en: for rescuing poor helpless Shadysider me!
[Deena] This is how we save Sam.
[Nick] Nick Goode. Nice to meet you.
[Nick] Being the heir apparent isn't always easy either.
translation.ko: 후계자로 사는 것도 쉬운 일은 아니야

translation.en: What if that's not who I want to be?
You believe me, right? About the curse?
translation.ko: 내 말 믿는 거죠? 저주 말이에요

translation.en: I've let a lot of people die…
-Nick, this isn't your fault. -But not you. I'm not letting you die.
translation.ko: - 닉 잘못이 아니에요 - 너까지 잃을 순 없어

translation.en: We need to kill Nick Goode.
But I called him… I thought…
I wanted to do that all day.
-Should be up here on the right. -Are we sure about this?
["Mo'murda" playing] ♪ Mo murda, mo murda, come again…♪
translation.ko: "마틴 P. 프랭클린 셰이디사이드 쇼핑몰 엔지니어" "파트너, 친구, 사업가"

translation.en: You gotta be kidding me. Yo, man, I wasn't doing nothing.
translation.ko: 또 뭐야? 난 아무것도 안 했어요

translation.en: Wanna help us kill Sheriff Goode?
[Martin] As the mall's lead custodial engineer, I ensure that all retail establishments
translation.ko: 쇼핑몰 수석 엔지니어라 아는데 여기 있는 모든 업체가

translation.en: This is the Cadillac of store gates.
Now, the 250 prevents your standard smash-and-grab, graffiti,
all while complying with the 70% visibility ordinance. Best part…
And we can rig them for quick release?
translation.ko: 더 빨리 움직이게 조작할 수 있을까?

translation.en: Little grease, these things go down faster than a Sunnyvale cheerleader.
translation.ko: 기름칠만 좀 하면 서니베일 치어리더 혓바닥처럼 날렵해져

translation.en: [Josh] So, Deena is the target now,
so the killers will go after Deena's blood just like they did with Sam.
translation.ko: 살인마들이 샘에게 그랬듯이 이번엔 디나의 피를 쫓을 거야

translation.en: And then we use that to lure them into the stores, and then…
translation.ko: 그러니까 디나의 피를 미끼로 가게 안으로 유인해서

translation.en: The killers will be locked up, then it's us versus Goode.
translation.ko: 그렇게 살인마들을 가두면 구드만 상대할 수 있지

translation.en: OK, sure, awesome, but then what?
Like how do we take out Goode?
Once they're down, how quickly can we get the gates back open?
translation.ko: 셔터가 내려간 상태에서 얼마나 빨리 다시 열리지?

translation.en: -[Martin] Depends, but-- -Why would we want to do that?
translation.ko: - 상황에 따라 다르지만… - 그건 왜 물어봐요?

translation.en: Look at this dumbass thing. It's bigger than a tape deck.
translation.ko: 이거 진짜 쓸모없지 않냐? 카세트보다 더 커

translation.en: If you want to hear more than one album, you got to carry all that too.
translation.ko: 앨범 여러 장 들으려면 다 챙겨야 하고

translation.en: It skips if you breathe on it.
Then listen to the radio, dude. We have a situation here.
translation.ko: 그럼 라디오를 들어 지금 그게 문제가 아니야

translation.en: Yeah, about that, Urkel. Um… what's really going on here?
translation.ko: 그거 말인데, 범생 무슨 일인지 설명 좀 해 봐

translation.en: Cool. There's a half-possessed tied-up white girl.
translation.ko: 악마에 반쯤 씐 여자애가 묶여 있구나

translation.en: I need you to stay calm, alright? I promise we got this all under control.
translation.ko: 정신 제대로 차려 다 계획대로 잘될 거야

translation.en: -OK. -[Josh] She's one of them, we'll save her.
translation.ko: - 그래 지금은 이 모양이지만 구할 수 있어

translation.en: We're gonna kill Sheriff Goode and save Shadyside.
translation.ko: 구드 보안관을 죽이고 셰이디사이드를 구하는 거야

translation.en: Any tips for fighting these things?
-[Ziggy] No, Cindy, no! No, no! -[Cindy] Let's go!
translation.ko: - 안 돼, 언니, 안 돼! - 빨리 가!

translation.en: [crowd shouting] Hang her! Hang her! Hang her!
Never seen a goody bag? All cops got 'em, for emergencies.
translation.ko: 이런 가방 처음 봤어? 경찰이면 다 있어, 비상용이지

translation.en: Full of useful stuff. There was this one ti…
translation.ko: 쓸 만한 게 많지 전에 한 번 내가…

translation.en: [Martin] I'll tell you again. Somebody planted that.
I wanted to see if you wanted one of these, uh… headlamps.
translation.ko: 누나도 혹시 이 헤드램프 필요할까 해서

translation.en: I know it looks pretty dumb, but…
Left, right, left, right, B, A, start.
translation.ko: 좌 우 좌 우 B A 시작

translation.en: It's a code for extra lives.
When things get bad at school or whatever, it's…
translation.ko: 학교에서 안 좋은 일이 있거나 할 때

translation.en: You smell like an androgynous baby.
Everyone says Shadyside sucks because it's full of shitty people,
translation.ko: 다들 지금껏 셰이디사이드는 사람들이 문제라고 했어

translation.en: that bad things happen here because we're bad,
translation.ko: 사람들이 악해서 나쁜 일이 생기는 거고

translation.en: that we deserve what we have coming.
That's how it was for Sarah,
and that's how it's been for us.
doesn't mean they can feed us through their meat grinder.
translation.ko: 고기 가는 기계에 갈려도 되는 건 아니야

translation.en: No one else has gotten this far.

translation.ko: 다 끝내자 오늘 밤 우리가 끝내는 거야

translation.en: Listen! You don't have any idea what's going on!
You're gonna die if you don't listen to me!
[police radio] Stolen vehicle located at Shadyside Mall. Officers scan Shadyside…
translation.ko: 셰이디사이드 쇼핑몰에 도난 차량이 있다, 경관들은…

translation.en: I got two more over here!
Sir, sir, just please let us explain!
-[Martin] Oh my! Holy… -[Christine] We gotta go!
OK. I need you to focus because the plan is still on, OK?
translation.ko: 됐어, 집중해 계획대로 하면 돼, 알았지?

translation.en: Stay out of their way. They'll walk right by you.
translation.ko: 지나갈 때 막지만 마 널 지나쳐 갈 거야

translation.en: Oh my God. He's gonna go right by, he's gonna go right by.
translation.ko: 세상에, 지나갈 거야 그냥 지나갈 거라고

translation.en: -How many is that? -I got one, Martin got the Milkman.
translation.ko: - 몇 잡았어? - 난 하나, 마틴은 밀크맨 잡았어

translation.en: -I don't know. We need to keep an eye on-- -Y-Y-Yo!
You don't have to do this.
[Nick] Deena! Get them away from me!
Oh God, oh God, oh God! No, no, no!
It's my shirt, it's covered in her blood!
translation.ko: 내 옷 때문이야 디나 피가 잔뜩 묻었어!

translation.en: OK, we need a plan B,
We just need more Plan A.
I got that creepy perv motherfucker in the bullseye.
[Josh] Now they're dead, but that's not gonna last.
We don't have a lot of time. We have to get ready to fight.
translation.ko: 시간이 별로 없어 싸울 준비를 해야 돼

translation.en: At least we still have magic blood.
No, no, no! We can find other weapons!
We can use the delivery hallway, outflank them.
translation.ko: 운반 통로를 이용해서 옆에서 쳐도 돼

translation.en: No, no! No, we're too close!
translation.ko: 아니, 그건 안 돼! 여기까지 왔는데!

translation.en: Too many people have died, I'm not letting them take my sister too!
translation.ko: 얼마나 많은 사람이 죽었는데! 누나까지 잃을 순 없어

translation.en: with nothing but words and stone!
from the depths of the Earth.
He extended his hand to the darkness
Get off of me! Get off of me! Get off of me!
Shadyside's newest piece of shit makes the front page!
And they're giving me a fucking medal.
[Sarah Fier] The truth shall be your curse.
I will shadow you for eternity.
You will feel the grip of my hand.
I will never let you go.
[female reporter] All is no longer good in Sunnyvale.
implicating Union County Sheriff Nicholas Goode
The family maintains they had no knowledge of Sheriff Goode's horrifying secret.
translation.ko: 가족 측은 보안관의 비밀을 전혀 몰랐다고 주장합니다

translation.en: No knowledge? What a bunch of dickheads.
But you know the doctor said I can't have any of… whatever that is.
translation.ko: 이게 뭔지는 몰라도 의사가 먹지 말랬던 것 같은데

translation.en: Are you serious? I made those
OK, whatever. Get in the car.

translation.ko: "인터뷰 갔다가 저녁에 올게 요리하지 마, 아빠가"

translation.en: -Pick you up later. -You not coming in?
Nah, I got something to do.

translation.ko: "편히 잠들길: 사이먼 칼리보다 케이트 슈밋, 헤더 왓킨스"

translation.en: No CDs, no tapes, no skipping. Look, check that out.
translation.ko: CD, 테이프도 필요 없고 튀지도 않아, 한번 봐

translation.en: Yeah, you know, but look, it fits all your jams and it's portable.
No. No, it's not. You know what? Fuck it! Y'all have no fucking vision.
translation.ko: 아니, 아니지, 됐어 물건 볼 줄 쥐뿔도 모르네

translation.en: I'm telling you, man. It's still too big.
It'll help with your, uh, size problems.
Find me online if you want to chat.
♪ His teeth as white as snow… ♪
And we're still here because of her.
-I'm still here because of you. -♪ …into a shady place ♪
What? It's true, you were dead without me.
